data.textUthmani: قُلْ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْءَانًا عَجَبًا
data.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] أُوحِىَ [It has been revealed] إِلَىَّ [to me] أَنَّهُ [that] ٱسْتَمَعَ [listened] نَفَرٌۭ [a group] مِّنَ [of] ٱلْجِنِّ [the jinn] فَقَالُوٓا۟ [and they said] إِنَّا [Indeed, we] سَمِعْنَا [heard] قُرْءَانًا [a Quran] عَجَبًۭا [amazing]
data.transliteration: Qul oohiya ilayya annahu istamaAAanafarun mina aljinni faqaloo inna samiAAnaqur-anan AAajaba

data.textUthmani: يَهْدِىٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشْدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ وَلَن نُّشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدًا
data.wordByWord: يَهْدِىٓ [It guides] إِلَى [to] ٱلرُّشْدِ [the right way] فَـَٔامَنَّا [so we believe] بِهِۦ ۖ [in it] وَلَن [and never] نُّشْرِكَ [we will associate] بِرَبِّنَآ [with our Lord] أَحَدًۭا [anyone]
data.transliteration: Yahdee ila arrushdi faamannabihi walan nushrika birabbina ahada

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَـٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَـٰحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّهُۥ [And that He ] تَعَـٰلَىٰ [Exalted is] جَدُّ [(the) Majesty] رَبِّنَا [(of) our Lord ] مَا [not] ٱتَّخَذَ [He has taken] صَـٰحِبَةًۭ [a wife] وَلَا [and not] وَلَدًۭا [a son]
data.transliteration: Waannahu taAAala jaddu rabbinama ittakhatha sahibatan wala walada

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّهُۥ [And that he] كَانَ [used to] يَقُولُ [speak ] سَفِيهُنَا [the foolish among us] عَلَى [against] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] شَطَطًۭا [an excessive transgression]
data.transliteration: Waannahu kana yaqoolu safeehunaAAala Allahi shatata

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلْإِنسُ وَٱلْجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّا [And that we] ظَنَنَّآ [thought] أَن [that] لَّن [never] تَقُولَ [will say] ٱلْإِنسُ [the men] وَٱلْجِنُّ [and the jinn] عَلَى [against] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] كَذِبًۭا [any lie]
data.transliteration: Waanna thanannaan lan taqoola al-insu waljinnu AAala Allahikathiba

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِّنَ ٱلْإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّهُۥ [And that] كَانَ [(there) were] رِجَالٌۭ [men] مِّنَ [among] ٱلْإِنسِ [mankind] يَعُوذُونَ [who sought refuge] بِرِجَالٍۢ [in (the) men] مِّنَ [from] ٱلْجِنِّ [the jinn] فَزَادُوهُمْ [so they increased them] رَهَقًۭا [(in) burden]
data.transliteration: Waannahu kana rijalun minaal-insi yaAAoothoona birijalin mina aljinni fazadoohumrahaqa

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا۟ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَبْعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّهُمْ [And that they] ظَنُّوا۟ [thought] كَمَا [as] ظَنَنتُمْ [you thought] أَن [that] لَّن [never] يَبْعَثَ [will raise] ٱللَّهُ [Allah] أَحَدًۭا [anyone]
data.transliteration: Waannahum thannoo kama thanantuman lan yabAAatha Allahu ahada

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدْنَـٰهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّا [And that we] لَمَسْنَا [sought to touch] ٱلسَّمَآءَ [the heaven] فَوَجَدْنَـٰهَا [but we found it] مُلِئَتْ [filled (with)] حَرَسًۭا [guards] شَدِيدًۭا [severe] وَشُهُبًۭا [and flaming fires]
data.transliteration: Waanna lamasna assamaafawajadnaha muli-at harasan shadeedanwashuhuba

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَـٰعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَن يَسْتَمِعِ ٱلْـَٔانَ يَجِدْ لَهُۥ شِهَابًا رَّصَدًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّا [And that we] كُنَّا [used to] نَقْعُدُ [sit] مِنْهَا [there in] مَقَـٰعِدَ [positions] لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ [for hearing] فَمَن [but (he) who] يَسْتَمِعِ [listens] ٱلْـَٔانَ [now] يَجِدْ [will find] لَهُۥ [for him] شِهَابًۭا [a flaming fire] رَّصَدًۭا [waiting]
data.transliteration: Waanna kunna naqAAudu minhamaqaAAida lissamAAi faman yastamiAAi al-anayajid lahu shihaban rasada

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِىٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّا [And that we ] لَا [not] نَدْرِىٓ [we know] أَشَرٌّ [whether evil] أُرِيدَ [is intended] بِمَن [for (those) who] فِى [(are) in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] أَمْ [or] أَرَادَ [intends] بِهِمْ [for them] رَبُّهُمْ [their Lord] رَشَدًۭا [a right path]
data.transliteration: Waanna la nadree asharrunoreeda biman fee al-ardi am arada bihim rabbuhumrashada

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّا [And that [we]] مِنَّا [among us] ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ [(are) the righteous] وَمِنَّا [and among us] دُونَ [(are) other than] ذَٰلِكَ ۖ [that] كُنَّا [We] طَرَآئِقَ [(are on) ways] قِدَدًۭا [different]
data.transliteration: Waanna minna assalihoonawaminna doona thalika kunna tara-iqaqidada

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعْجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَن نُّعْجِزَهُۥ هَرَبًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّا [And that we] ظَنَنَّآ [[we] have become certain] أَن [that] لَّن [never] نُّعْجِزَ [we will cause failure] ٱللَّهَ [(to) Allah] فِى [in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] وَلَن [and never] نُّعْجِزَهُۥ [we can escape Him] هَرَبًۭا [(by) flight]
data.transliteration: Wanna thanannaan lan nuAAjiza Allaha fee al-ardi walan nuAAjizahuharaba

data.textUthmani: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ فَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا
data.wordByWord: وَأَنَّا [And that [we]] لَمَّا [when] سَمِعْنَا [we heard] ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ [the Guidance] ءَامَنَّا [we believed] بِهِۦ ۖ [in it] فَمَن [And whoever] يُؤْمِنۢ [believes] بِرَبِّهِۦ [in his Lord] فَلَا [then not] يَخَافُ [he will fear] بَخْسًۭا [any loss] وَلَا [and not] رَهَقًۭا [any burden]
data.transliteration: Waanna lamma samiAAnaalhuda amanna bihi faman yu/min birabbihifala yakhafu bakhsan wala rahaqa
